title: Best baron and Dragon steals?
body: So ive recently gotten more into league and i love to steal barons from ppl, can we please get a string of videos with our best steals?

replies.body: i saw this vid where a karthus stole dragon with ludens proc from ult, or malz runs in, e enemy champ, dies, eventually gets 3 kills, baron, then finishes a penta

there was one on magikarpusedfly's series league of failures where a malzahar got a pentakill and stole baron with his space aids after the rest of his team died in a wombo, so that the moment all 4 of them came up they got baron and the entire enemy team was aced.
thats where i saw the malz one i said, same with the karthus one, remeber when janna stole their baron
